name: ChartAxis
description: Represents a single axis in a chart.

properties.name: format
properties.description: Represents the formatting of a chart object, which includes line and font formatting.

properties.name: majorGridlines
properties.description: Returns a gridlines object that represents the major gridlines for the specified axis.

properties.name: majorUnit
properties.description: Represents the interval between two major tick marks. Can be set to a numeric value or an empty string.  The returned value is always a number.

properties.name: maximum
properties.description: Represents the maximum value on the value axis.  Can be set to a numeric value or an empty string (for automatic axis values).  The returned value is always a number.

properties.name: minimum
properties.description: Represents the minimum value on the value axis. Can be set to a numeric value or an empty string (for automatic axis values).  The returned value is always a number.

properties.name: minorGridlines
properties.description: Returns a Gridlines object that represents the minor gridlines for the specified axis.

properties.name: minorUnit
properties.description: Represents the interval between two minor tick marks. "Can be set to a numeric value or an empty string (for automatic axis values). The returned value is always a number.

properties.name: showDisplayUnitLabel
properties.description: Represents whether the axis display unit label is visible.

properties.name: customDisplayUnit
properties.description: Represents the custom axis display unit value. Read Only. To set this property, please use the SetCustomDisplayUnit(double) method.

properties.name: majorTimeUnitScale
properties.description: Returns or sets the major unit scale value for the category axis when the CategoryType property is set to TimeScale.

properties.name: minorTimeUnitScale
properties.description: Returns or sets the minor unit scale value for the category axis when the CategoryType property is set to TimeScale.

properties.name: baseTimeUnit
properties.description: Returns or sets the base unit for the specified category axis.

properties.name: categoryType
properties.description: Returns or sets the category axis type.

properties.name: axisGroup
properties.description: Represents the group for the specified axis.

properties.name: scaleType
properties.description: Represents the value axis scale type.

properties.name: logBase
properties.description: Represents the base of the logarithm when using logarithmic scales.

methods.name: setCustomDisplayUnit
methods.description: Sets the axis display unit to a custom value.

methods.name: setCategoryNames
methods.description: Sets all the category names for the specified axis.

parameters.name: sourceData
parameters.description: The Range object corresponding to the source data.
